app.title: Can you break the algorithm?
app.description: You're a journalist. A new app is taking its toll of the mental health of teenagers. Find out how its algorithm works.

tweet.text: Can you break TikTube's algorithm? Take your chance!

intro.heading:
Can you break
the algorithm?
intro.description:
You're a journalist. A new app is taking its toll of the mental health of teenagers. Find out how its algorithm works.

Every example in the game is based on real cases.

over.share:
At AlgorithmWatch, we work hard to bring light to automated systems from the real world. We conducted audits from TikTok, Instagram, LinkedIn and Google products, sometimes forcing Big Tech to implement changes.

If you'd like to support our work, you can
  • Share this game with your network,
  • Make a donation – even 1€ helps!
  • Subscribe to the Automated Society newsletter, probably the best biweekly briefing on automated decision-making in Europe.

hints.description: You'll receive e-mails during the game.
